title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Sep 3 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Sep 3 2021
description:
Zach Van Meter, head of a group of private citizens that mobilized a global network to conduct a military-style rescue operation in Afghanistan (Commercial Task Force), joins the show to talk about how it all came together. Trapped in Afghanistan, rescued by volunteers: How a handful of Americans freed 5,000 Afghans. Words of wisdom from our friend Larry Elder. Ivermectin won the 2015 Nobel Prize for Science. AOC blames heavy rain on climate change, only solution is more government regulations and taxes. Buck gives his summertime reading list.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
